name: admin.workflows.collaborators.remove
desc: Remove collaborators from workflows within the team or enterprise

collaborator_ids.desc: Array of collaborators (encoded user IDs) to remove; max 50.

workflow_ids.desc: Array of workflow IDs to edit; max 50.

errors.not_allowed: The user is not allowed to access this API method
errors.error_removing_collaborators: There were one or more errors adding workflow collaborators
